mapper.insert: insert into user_base (user_id, user_username, user_password, user_phone, user_gender, user_address1, user_address2, user_address3) values (#{userId}, #{userUsername}, #{userPassword}, #{userPhone}, #{userGender}, #{userAddress1}, #{userAddress2}, #{userAddress3})
mapper.select: select user_id from user_base where user_username=#{inputStr} or user_phone=#{inputStr} order by user_id limit 1
